title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2859/94 of 25 November 1994 fixing for the 1994/95 marketing year the reference price for sweet oranges
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2859/94 of 25 November 1994 fixing for the 1994/95 marketing year the reference price for sweet oranges
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1994/95 marketing year, the reference price for fresh sweet oranges (CN codes 0805 10 11, 15, 19, 21, 25, 29, 31, 35, 39, 41, 45 and 49) expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net and applicable to class I all sizes, packed, shall, for  the period 1 December 1994 to 31 May 1995, be: 22,75.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 December 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 November 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
